channel.title: Adding stuff into the Character files
channel.description:
[code][CHARACTER] character-height = 0 character-posx = 2605 character-posy = 3402 character-rights = 20 character-lastconnection = 127.0.0.1 character-special = 997350 character-tz = -1 character-starter = 999 character-pouch1 = 0 character-pouch2 = 0 character-pouch3 = 0 character-pouch4 = 0 character-energy = 999997900 character-taskID = -1 character-taskAmount = -1 character-jad = 15 character-q1 = 15 character-q2 = 15 character-q3 = 15 character-q4 = 15 character-q5 = 15 character-q6 = 15 character-q7 = 15 character-q8 = 15 character-q9 = 15 character-q10 = 15 character-q11 = 15 character-brightness = 0 character-fighttype = 1 character-skill = 0 character-chat = 0 character-ancients = 0 character-pin = 0 character-saradomin = 0 character-retaliate = 0 character-action = 0 character-pcpoints = 4998950 character-assault = 23791 character-donator = 15 character-bow = 100 character-shield = 100[/code]
How would I make it that when you create an account you add something to that list?

item.title: Adding stuff into the Character files
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.source: Adding stuff into the Character files

item.title: Adding stuff into the Character files
item.dc:creator: @MoparScapeHelp MoparScapeHelp
item.description:
@MoparScapeHelp wrote:

Go to “player.java” and search for the item code of the thing that they ALREADY START WITH. Then change it to whatever you want, and you can also add more.
-MoparScapeHelp

Read full topic
item.source: Adding stuff into the Character files
